NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: FOR ALL KEYWORDS: If your language has cases, the keyword NAMES must be lower case, or they won't match!

DESCRIPTION: Bei dem Betreten dieser #yHaltung, verliere [W] [W] . Du kannst nicht #yStances wechseln. Verlasse diese #yHaltung anbeginn des nächsten Zuges.
Orb: Verliere 1 Fokus zu Beginn jedes Zuges.

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Buffer power from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Erhalte immer zu Beginn deines Zuges #yMantra.
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Devotion power from the base game.
This is a keyword for the Injury Curse card from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Pearlescence is a card that copies the card previously played in the same turn.

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Slimed status from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Slow creatures take #b10% more damage from Attacks for each previous card played that turn.
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is a keyword for the Slow debuff from the base game.

DESCRIPTION: Vapors are cards with minor effects derived from your potions. They Retain and Exhaust.
